resource.chars:
<u>Convolutions sending fibres into corpus callosum anteriorly<\u>
[What then are the convolutions <s>in the <\s> anterior to 
the sulcus precentralis <s>region of the brain <\s> wh: send fibres into the corpus 
callosum? Do they all contribute to form it or is there 
any exemption. I do not think there is. <s> I think 
that they all main bulk of the anterior half of the corpus callosum 
fibres is indeed derived from here <\s>. The <s>first & second <\s> 1st & 2nd 
frontal send fibres obliquely downwards, directly back-
wards, & obliquely upwards, forwards, & backwards.
The gyrus rectus as before mentioned sends its fibres 
in the last named direction, and the whole of these 
cross & pass into the inner & outer capsules. <s>to The only <\s>
